title: Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Z Flip 3 hands-on
description:
Samsung’s new Galaxy Z Fold 3 and Galaxy Z Flip 3 are the company’s most refined foldable phones yet. The Fold 3 supports the S Pen stylus on its large display, and the Flip 3 has a much more useful cover screen. Samsung says both phones are also more durable, thanks to design upgrades, and they’re now officially rated IPX8 for water resistance.
